abstract: Anita Caspary, onetime mother superior who led the largest single exodus of nuns from the Roman Catholic Church in American history, dies at age 95.
snippet: Dr. Caspary, who went by her religious name, Mother Humiliata, led the largest single exodus of nuns from the Roman Catholic Church in American history.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Caspary, who went by her religious name, Mother Humiliata, led the largest single exodus of nuns from the Roman Catholic Church in American history.

headline.main: Anita Caspary, Nun Who Led Breakaway From Church, Dies at 95
headline.print_headline: Anita Caspary, 95, Nun Who Broke With Rome
headline.seo: Anita Caspary, 95, Nun Who Led Breakaway From Church, Dies
